summary: This bill, the 'Strengthening our Servicemembers with Milk Act,' mandates the Secretary of Defense to provide fluid or powdered milk to members of the Armed Forces at dining facilities on military installations. The milk must be offered in various forms, including unflavored, flavored, organic, non-organic, and different fat content levels, as well as lactose-free options. The bill prohibits the purchase of milk from entities controlled by foreign adversaries, as defined by the Secretary of Commerce.
